programme.title: Transformers One
programme.desc: Brothers-in-arms Orion Pax and D-16 become sworn enemies Optimus Prime and Megatron.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Shark Tale
programme.desc: A fast-talking fish gains fame after taking credit for the accidental death of a shark mobster. While enjoying the popularity at first, his tall tale starts to unravel as others begin to suspect that he is not the Defender of the Reef after all, and when the sharks enemies get involved, his lies lead him into dangerous waters. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: Fireheart
programme.desc: In New York City in 1932, women are not allowed to be firefighters. When the citys firemen disappear in mysterious fires, Georgia Nolan sees a golden opportunity. She disguises herself as Joe and joins a team of improvised firemen.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Sing
programme.desc: A pig, a mouse, a porcupine, a gorilla, an elephant and other animals gather at a koalas theatre for a singing competition.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: Po must unlock secrets of his past in order to defeat a formidable villain who plans to wipe out kung fu and conquer China. A DreamWorks animation.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie
programme.desc: Flightless birds lead a mostly happy existence, except for Red, who just cant get past the daily annoyances of life. His temperament leads him to anger management class, where he meets fellow misfits Chuck and Bomb. Red becomes even more agitated when his feathered brethren welcome green pigs to their island paradise. As the swine begin to get under his skin, Red joins forces with Chuck and Bomb to investigate the real reason behind their mysterious arrival.

programme.title: The Angry Birds Movie 2
programme.desc: Red, Chuck, Bomb and the rest of their feathered friends are surprised when a green pig suggests that they put aside their differences and unite to fight a common threat. Aggressive birds from an island covered in ice are planning to use an elaborate weapon to destroy the fowl and swine way of life. After picking their best and brightest, the birds and pigs come up with a scheme to infiltrate the island, deactivate the device and return to their respective paradises intact.

programme.title: Buffalo Kids
programme.desc: Arriving in New York City in 1886, two orphaned Irish siblings embark on a wild cross-country journey aboard a transcontinental train. They make a new friend and encounter heroes and villains in their quest to find a new home.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Rugrats Go Wild
programme.desc: The children and their bickering family are stranded on a desert island. Fortunately help is at hand from the Thornberry family, who are visiting the island to film a rare snow leopard. Once again, animal-understanding Eliza saves the day.

programme.title: Teen Titans GO! to the Movies
programme.desc: With a few madcap ideas and a song in their hearts, the Teen Titans head to Hollywood to fulfill their dreams. Things soon go awry, however, when a supervillain plans to take over the planet, putting the very fate of the young heroes on the line.

programme.title: Teen Titans GO! to the Movies
programme.desc: With a few madcap ideas and a song in their hearts, the Teen Titans head to Hollywood to fulfill their dreams. Things soon go awry, however, when a supervillain plans to take over the planet, putting the very fate of the young heroes on the line.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: A fast-talking cop trails his best friends killer from the alleys of Detroit to the posh galleries of Beverly Hills.

programme.title: Dumb and Dumber To
programme.desc: Twenty years after their last adventure, good-hearted, yet dimwitted best friends, Harry Dunne and Lloyd Christmas head out in search for Harrys long lost daughter, and Lloyds in love again.

programme.title: Were the Millers
programme.desc: Indebted to a big-time drug lord, a pot dealer travels to Mexico with a fake family and a camper to pick up a large shipment and smuggle it into the U.S.

programme.title: Crazy Rich Asians
programme.desc: Rachel Chu is happy to accompany her longtime boyfriend, Nick, to his best friends wedding in Singapore. Shes also surprised to learn that Nicks family is extremely wealthy and hes considered one of the countrys most eligible bachelors. Thrust into the spotlight, Rachel must now contend with jealous socialites, quirky relatives and something far, far worse: Nicks disapproving mother.

programme.title: The Longest Yard
programme.desc: Paul `Wrecking Crewe was a revered football superstar back in his day, but that time has since faded. When a messy drunk driving incident lands him in jail, Paul finds he was specifically requested by Warden Hazen, a duplicitous prison official well aware of Pauls athletic skills. Paul has been assigned the task of assembling a team of convicts, to square off in a big football game against the sadistic guards.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: You, Me and Dupree
programme.desc: Carl is in seventh heaven when he marries his gorgeous girlfriend Molly in Hawaii. After a blissful honeymoon, they get back to find best man Dupree jobless, penniless and homeless. When Carl offers him a place to crash, he has no idea of the havoc that the blonde bum is about to cause.

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: The continuing adventures of the Portokalos family. A follow-up to the 2002 comedy, My Big Fat Greek Wedding.

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: Video game experts are recruited by the military to fight 1980s-era video game characters whove attacked New York.

programme.title: The School of Rock
programme.desc: After guitarist Dewey is kicked out of his own band, he pretends to be a teacher. When he hears the kids play, he realises they could be his support group in the Battle of the Bands, and hell finally get to be the rock star he knows hes destined to be.

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective
programme.desc: Tale about an unconventional sleuths attempts to find a football teams stolen mascot dolphin. The Miami Dolphins are aghast when their beloved Snowflake is abducted one week before the all-important Super Bowl, so they call in Ace Ventura, a private eye who uses unorthodox methods to retrieve missing animals.

programme.title: One of Them Days
programme.desc: When her boyfriend takes her rent money, Alyssa and her roommate race against the clock to avoid eviction and keep their friendship intact.

programme.title: The Terminal
programme.desc: Eastern European visitor Viktor arrives in New York only to find that his papers are no longer valid. Rules being rules, airport chief Dixon cant let Viktor into America, or let him leave. Viktor has to survive by his wits, and slowly becomes the darling of the airport, as his sweet nature charms all who work there - except Dixon.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: Rob Peace
programme.desc: Raised by his devoted mother, a brilliant young man risks everything hes worked for to free his imprisoned father.

programme.title: Anatomy of a Murder
programme.desc: Frederick Manion, an army lieutenant, is arrested for the murder of bartender, Barney Quill. In defence, he claims that the victim had beaten and raped his wife. With such evidence somewhat lacking, Manions lawyer, Paul Biegler attempts to save his defendant from prosecution, setting his assistants in search of witnesses.

programme.title: Schindlers List
programme.desc: True story of German businessman Oskar Schindlers efforts to save his Jewish workers from being exterminated in Nazi concentration camps.

programme.title: Ferrari
programme.desc: During the summer of 1957, bankruptcy looms over the company that Enzo Ferrari and his wife built 10 years earlier. He decides to roll the dice and wager it all on the iconic Mille Miglia, a treacherous 1,000-mile race across Italy.

programme.title: Dear John
programme.desc: Whilst on leave, a Marine falls in love with a college student. The long-distance relationship is then tested when the Marine decides to re-enlist post-9/11.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: Set on a Greek island, a young woman who is about to be married suspects that any one of three men could be her father. She invites them all to her wedding without telling her mother. Movie adaptation of the musical, set to Abbas greatest hits.

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: In 1979 Donna falls in love with Sam while embarking on a series of adventures throughout Europe. In the present day, Donnas pregnant daughter reunites with her mothers old friends and boyfriends on the Greek island of Kalokairi.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: A man returns home to Cleveland for his mothers funeral, where he must confront his grief, reconnect with estranged family members, and forge new relationships.

programme.title: The Good Half
programme.desc: A man returns home to Cleveland for his mothers funeral, where he must confront his grief, reconnect with estranged family members, and forge new relationships.

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: The Spiderwick Chronicles
programme.desc: Two twin brothers, Jared and Simon, and their sister Mallory are relocated by their mother to their great-great uncles creepy home in the middle of nowhere. Exploring, Jared finds his great-great uncles secret study and a book, the `Field Guide to the Fantastical World around Them, which opens up a world of goblins, spirits, ogres, trolls and griffins, some of whom are friendly and helpful and others not.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
programme.desc: The second instalment of boy wizard Harry Potters adventures at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, based on the novel by JK Rowling. A mysterious elf tells Harry to expect trouble during his second year at Hogwarts, but nothing can prepare him for trees that fight back, flying cars, spiders that talk and deadly warnings written in blood on the walls of the school.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
programme.desc: Harry, Hermione and Ron return for a third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry, but the school is under lockdown as notorious murderer Sirius Black has escaped from the jail of Azkaban and apparently has a score to settle with Harry. Hermione has a trick up her sleeve for getting to all her classes on time, which comes in handy in solving the latest mystery for the magical students.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
programme.desc: Harry is mysteriously selected to compete in the prestigious Triwizard Tournament, a thrilling competition that pits him against more experienced students from Hogwarts and two rival wizarding schools. Meanwhile, supporters of the evil Lord Voldemort send a shockwave of fear throughout the wizard community when their Dark Mark scorches the sky at the Quidditch World Cup, signalling a return to power.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
programme.desc: Harry is dismayed when the Ministry of Magic denies Voldemorts return and appoints a nasty new teacher at Hogwarts to keep an eye on Dumbledore. The new teachers constant meddling with the curriculum convinces the students that school cannot prepare them for the battle ahead, so they form a secret duelling club with Harry as their tutor.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
programme.desc: Harry and the gang confront the terrifying truth that Lord Voldemort is back and Hogwarts is in danger.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 1
programme.desc: Following Dumbledores death, Lord Voldemort and his cronies have taken over the Ministry of Magic and are hellbent on killing Harry Potter. As a result, the good wizards of the Order of the Phoenix arrive at Harrys home and whisk him to safety, but the Death Eaters are hot on his trail. Harry, Hermione and Ron set out on a epic quest to destroy all the locate and destroy all the horcruxes.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part 2
programme.desc: Harry, Ron and Hermione have escaped Bellatrix Lestranges clutches, but their getaway has come at a price. Dobby has been killed, meanwhile Lord Voldemort has acquired the highly powerful Elder Wand from Dumbledores tomb. Still on a quest to destroy the Horcruxes that hold the pieces of Voldemorts soul, Harry breaks into Bellatrix vault, where he finds a Horcrux.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Harry Potter and the Philosophers Stone
programme.desc: Big-screen adaptation of the best-selling novel by JK Rowling about an 11-year-old boy living with his cruel aunt and uncle who learns that he is the orphaned son of powerful wizards. Harry is offered a place at Hogwarts, a prestigious boarding school for wizards, where he begins piecing together the mystery of his parents deaths with the help of his new-found friends.

programme.title: Taxi Driver
programme.desc: New York City cab driver Travis Bickle constantly reflects on the ugly corruption of life around him, and becomes increasingly disturbed over his own loneliness and alienation. In nearly every phase of his life, Bickle remains a complete outsider, failing to make emotional contact with anyone. Unable to sleep night after night, Travis haunts the local pornography emporiums to find diversion.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Last Action Hero
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Danny is given a magic ticket by a strange projectionist and is transported into the cinema screen. Thanks to his advance knowledge of the plot, he is able to help his silver-screen hero out of an awkward situation and becomes his partner. Theres trouble in store for the unlikely duo when the villain tries to seize the magic ticket.

programme.title: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
programme.desc: On his return from the Crusades, Robin of Locksley learns that his father has been murdered by the tyrannical Sheriff of Nottingham and embarks on a campaign of guerrilla warfare to protect King Richards throne. Fight scenes are lively and inventive, and a set piece fought under the forest canopy pulls out all the stops.

programme.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Epic tale in which an intrepid archaeologist tries to beat a band of Nazis to a unique religious relic which is central to their plans for world domination. Battling against a snake phobia and a vengeful ex-girlfriend, Indiana Jones is in constant peril, making hairs-breadth escapes at every turn in this celebration of the innocent adventure movies of an earlier era.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Adventure sequel. Intrepid archaeologist Indiana Jones, on the trail of fortune and glory in Old Shanghai, is ricocheted into a dangerous adventure in India. With his faithful companion Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott, Indie goes in search of the magical Sankara stone, and uncovers an ancient evil which threatens all who come into contact with it.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: The intrepid explorer Indiana Jones sets out to rescue his father, a medievalist who has vanished while searching for the Holy Grail. Following clues in the old mans notebook, Indy arrives in Venice, where he enlists the help of a beautiful academic, but they are not the only ones who are on the trail, and some sinister old enemies soon come out of the woodwork.

programme.title: Blade Runner
programme.desc: An ex-cop sets out on the trail of androids who have mutinied in a bid to extend their limited lifespan and fled back to Earth.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: The Shining
programme.desc: Frustrated writer Jack Torrance takes a job as the winter caretaker at the ominous, mountain-locked Overlook Hotel so that he can write in peace. When he arrives there with his wife and son, they learn that the previous caretaker had gone mad. Slowly Jack becomes possessed by the evil, demonic presence in the hotel.

programme.title: Friday the 13th, Part II
programme.desc: Jason returns to avenge the death of his decapitated mother with a pitchfork and a thirst for blood. Teenagers at a nearby camp fall prey to the killer in the woods in this hillbilly horror flick.

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: Event Horizon
programme.desc: After disappearing for seven years, revolutionary spaceship Event Horizon is rediscovered. The team of scientists sent to investigate find that the entire crew is dead, and a terrifying, malevolent presence is lurking on board.

programme.title: King Kong
programme.desc: A down-on-her-luck actress accepts an offer to star in a film shot on a mysterious island. While there, the actress is abducted by natives who offer her as a sacrifice to a giant ape, which instead of harming the starlet becomes smitten with her. The crew manage to capture the ape and bring it back to Manhattan to exhibit as a showpiece. However, on the shows opening night, things go horribly wrong.

programme.title: Pompeii
programme.desc: As Mount Vesuvius rains down lava and ash, a gladiator (Kit Harington) races to save the woman (Emily Browning) he loves before the city collapses.

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: A group set out on safari into the heart of the Congo. Each have their different reasons for the trip, but nothing could have prepared them for the greatest danger - a troop of intelligent killer apes.

programme.title: Aquaman and the Lost Kingdom
programme.desc: Black Manta wields the power of the mythic Black Trident to unleash an ancient and malevolent force. Hoping to end his reign of terror, Aquaman forges an unlikely alliance with his brother to protect their kingdom and save the world from destruction.

programme.title: Man of Steel
programme.desc: Though struggling with the ramifications of his extraordinary origin and abilities, young Clark Kent must become a hero and save those he loves from a dire threat.

programme.title: The Green Hornet
programme.desc: The heir to a newspaper fortune joins forces with a resourceful company employee to try to bring a powerful Los Angeles crime lord to justice.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: The curator of the Louvre museum is murdered, leaving behind a chain of obscure clues to a world-changing secret. Cryptologist Sophie Neveu and Harvard professor Robert Langdon embark on a race against time to uncover the precious truth before it falls into the wrong hands.

programme.title: Angels and Demons
programme.desc: Having ruffled the feathers of the Catholic Church with his controversial investigations into Christian history, Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon is surprised to be approached by the Popes emissaries for help. Following the Popes recent death, the four candidates most likely to take the pontiffs place have been kidnapped by a mysterious organisation known as the Illuminati.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: Baby, a music-loving orphan also happens to be the prodigiously talented go-to getaway driver for heist mastermind Doc. With the perfect soundtrack picked out for each and every job, Baby ensures Docs violent, bank-robbing cronies - including Buddy, Bats and Darling - get in and out of Dodge before its too late. Hes not in it for the long haul though, hoping to nail one last job before riding off into the sunset with beautiful diner waitress Debora. Easier said than done.

However, when Hopparoo challenges the lovable dog train to a race, the package bounces out of the carriage and embarks upon a crazy journey round Tickety Town, with Tommy and Tallulah in hot pursuit.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tickety Town is covered in fallen leaves, so Tommy and Tallulah are using McCogginss new prototype street sweeper to clear them. However, in their eagerness to speed things up, they go against his instructions and press the turbo button. Suddenly, the sweeper goes haywire, rampaging through town and sucking up anything in its path, including Madame Au Laits clock key and very nearly Hopparoo too.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The whole town gathers to take part in McCoggins treasure hunt. Whoever finds the most cogs will be the winner. Knowing that McCoggins hides the cogs in the same places every year, Tommy and Tallulah are cruising to victory, until they realise that a quick win will spoil everyones day, but when they borrow McCoggins special clockwork rollerskates to put the cogs back, the skates zoom out of control.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: The twins decide that everyone must get active and turn Tickety town into a boot camp. With Tommy banging his drum and Tallulah blowing on her trumpet, soon everyone is lifting, running, puffing and panting. They are all so exhausted that they fall fast asleep, but with Chime Time imminent, they must find a way to wake up Puffertys wheels.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: When Hopparoo bursts all their bubbles with his sharp ears, the twins use McCoggins extra-strong bubble mixture instead and blow a bubble so huge that it engulfs Battersby, Madame Au Lait, McCoggins, Lopsiloo, Chikidee and finally Tommy and Tallulah themselves! Where is Hopparoo? Only his sharp ears can free them for Chime Time.

programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Tommy and Tallulah love dressing up and surprising each other with their crazy costumes, but when they decide to surprise everybody else in town too Hopparoo is not impressed. programme.title: Tickety Toc
programme.desc: Madame Au Lait is teaching the twins pottery, and to inspire them she shows them a magnificent cow pot that she made on her wheel, but when she leaves them to their enthusiastic pot-making, they accidentally smash it and when they try to repair it, they only make things worse. Trying to re-create the pot is even more of a disaster. Huge quantities of clay fly from their wheel into the town, blocking Puffertys tracks.

programme.title: Tickety Toc

programme.desc: SG-1 and ONeill utilise the time-puddle jumper to go to Ancient Egypt to recover a ZPM. When they return they discover that the future has been altered and SG-1 never existed. Meanwhile, archaeologists find the video camera Daniel took with them to Ancient Egypt with instructions to find the Stargate, track down Tealc, and return to the past in order to correct the future.

programme.title: Star Trek: Voyager
programme.desc: Tuvok and Paris, lost in present-day Los Angeles, enlist the aid of a young astronomer and use cellular technology to communicate with the earth-orbiting Voyager.

programme.title: Star Trek: The Next Generation
programme.desc: While docking for repairs at an Earth station, the crew has an opportunity to visit their families, an experience that is particularly painful for Captain Picard.

programme.title: Star Trek: Deep Space Nine
programme.sub-title: Let He Who Is Without Sin ...
programme.desc: While taking a holiday on the planet Risa, Worf falls under the influence of a traditionalist group bent on destroying the pleasure paradise.

programme.title: Forensics: Catching the Killer
programme.desc: A look at how forensic science can help police solve serious crimes where the truth seems impossible to uncover. As the various twists and turns of each case unfold, the role of forensic science in providing answers is highlighted and examined.

programme.title: Grimm
programme.desc: A romantic day for Monroe and Rosalee takes a dangerous turn when they encounter a bloodthirsty creature.

programme.title: Warehouse 13
programme.desc: Artie assigns Pete and Myka to investigate a number of suspicious suicides in a Florida prison.

programme.title: Brit Cops: Frontline Crime UK
programme.desc: Action-packed documentary following Britains police. From the pursuit of a drink driver to an escalating domestic dispute, cops in west Wales have their work cut out.

programme.title: The Force: North East
programme.desc: Theres a tense stand-off as officers try to talk down a man brandishing a samurai sword. The cells fill up during a busy Saturday night in Newcastle.

programme.title: Border Patrol
programme.desc: A troublesome taxi drivers keeps Customs and the police busy, while some solar lights arrive supercharged with drugs.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: A German shepherd mix and an L.A. firefighter search for mudslide survivors, spaniels search for underground water leaks and a Labrador learns to read.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand
programme.desc: In New Zealand, two wild fortresses protect the vulnerable native animals: One a remote island protected by a moat of saltwater, the other a hilltop citadel surrounded by a predator-proof barrier. This is the story of these delicate sanctuaries and the life that thrives within them.

programme.title: Gangs Of Baboon Falls
programme.desc: As the Zimbabwe and Zambia gangs negotiate predators as they forage on the river banks, the Victoria gang try to keep a new food source hidden from baboons and humans alike.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Elderly marmoset Jenny gets a visit from the vet before the arrival of a new life partner, while orangutan youngster Hujan begins to adjust to living life in the nursery.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison travels to Hampshire to rescue marmoset Clyde from a life in the pet trade, while the young orangutan Hujan gets to meet with older male Bulu in the nursery.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: A blind woman gets a running mate and a pack of dogs protect rhinos in Kenya. Meanwhile, a Border Collie protects visitors in Glacier National Park.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand
programme.desc: Spring on New Zealands east coast is a time of promise for the New Zealand Fur Seal and the Norther Royal Albatross. Theyve returned to their land to breed. But harsh terrain, fickle weather and hungry predators will conspire to make lives difficult for them. Only the strongest will survive to carry forward their legacy.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Face a life-and-death struggle with vet Bec, who gives a koala joey mouth-to-mouth, and see vet Meaghan test her microsurgical skills on a baby fruit bats teeny toes. Catch a bath-averse python and tag along as rescuer Jo nabs a trapped barn owl.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Join Lizzie on her most perilous Atlantic adventure yet, free diving with bull sharks. Explore otherworldly Gulf Coast swamps teeming with hungry alligators and crafty snapping turtles. Discover tiny but mighty beach mice that strengthen sand dunes.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa
programme.desc: The wildlife of South Africas lowveld are forced to adapt to the dry season. Everyone from the gargantuan hippos to the nimble antelope must go on a quest to seek water.

programme.title: Hope for Wildlife
programme.desc: Hope has more white-tailed deer than any previous year, and rounding them up for release is a bigger challenge than ever before!

programme.title: Deep Dive Australia
programme.desc: Saying goodbye to the tropics and dipping into cool southern-coast waters. Coming face-to-face with majestic grey nurse sharks, shape-shifting cuttlefish and huge blue whales, and playing with penguins and sea lions.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa
programme.desc: The Addo Elephant Park was founded in 1931 and is 1,640km2. It hosts more than 450 elephants and other mammals and was created in response to the elephant population falling as low as eleven.

programme.title: Gangs Of Baboon Falls
programme.desc: Look back at how the gangs have fared throughout a bizarre year of lockdown and return to normal.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: A visit from the vet awaits one of the parks strangest residents, while the small monkey team lose the battle to save tragic marmoset Koba, who had been taken out of the pet trade.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Alison looks forward to the prospect of baboons being at the park, while recently arrived marmoset Clyde, rescued from the pet trade, braves the great outdoors for the first time.

programme.title: Dogs With Extraordinary Jobs
programme.desc: Dogs are using their remarkable scenting skills for lifesaving conservation and pro-active environmental policing. In Canada, a team of canine detectives is sniffing out the destructive invasive zebra mussel.

programme.title: Wildest New Zealand
programme.desc: New Zealands isolated islands are famed as an unusual paradise, home to a variety of unique wildlife. Best known for its flightless birds, ancient reptiles and coastal mammals, a closer look reveals another world. A land of miniature monsters, Lilliputian predators and tiny terrors that lead remarkable lives, where every hunter is also the hunted and survival is always a giant struggle. Journey into the undergrowth and discover life on a different scale.

programme.title: Wildlife ER
programme.desc: Watch senior vet Tim tutor new recruit Phil through an injured koala checkup, and track the teams solutions for animals plagued by the summer heat. Celebrate as vet Karina solves a puzzling frog case and releases an old friend whos ready to fly.

programme.title: Deep Dive North America
programme.desc: Bundle up as Lizzie heads north to tag sharks and witness first-hand the slow, sobering disappearance of sea ice. Do time in bear jail with polar bears who are caught raiding a town for food after their icy hunting grounds diminish.

programme.title: Waterworld Africa
programme.desc: Nestled on the western coast of South Africa lies an extraordinary cove that is host to an abundance of marine and bird life. It provides ample food and spurs a life cycle that reaches well beyond Africa. This is the Blue Lagoon.

programme.title: Crown Court

programme.title: Crown Court
programme.desc: Anne Silk tells how maidens of the Fulchester Witchcraft Coven are expected to part in orgies. Rev Felix Garmonsway gives evidence about the black arts.

programme.title: Crown Court

programme.title: Look at Life

As he searches for some meaning in his experiences, the story of his life is told in flashback, incorporating a number of Ernest Hemingways tales in addition to the short story of the title.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Road Trip
programme.desc: Gordon, Gino and Fred travel to France, where Fred has been asked to co-host an Oyster Festival in the beautiful Arcachon Bay, in just four days time. Reunited with their campervan, Fred nominates himself as the driver in his homeland.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsays Road Trip
programme.desc: The trio heads to Scotland as Gordon prepares to cook a feast for the chief of Clan Ramsay and his friends. Gordon shows the others how to dress like real Scotsmen as they go in search of Scottish beef, hunt for scallops and play some Highland Games.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table
programme.desc: Pati explores some unique spots in Guadalajara where food and art truly connect. In her kitchen, she makes pollo a la valentina, rice with poblanos and corn, and an almond tres leches cake.

programme.title: Patis Mexican Table

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern reimagines the Hawaiian plate lunch with a hand chopped venison burger topped with homemade gravy and a fried egg, jumbo grilled shrimp, a humble macaroni salad and a heaping scoop of white rice.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Creamy Clam Chowder and Mussels in Spicy Tomato Sauce
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern demystifies cooking clams, mussels and oysters.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern grills his favorite tender cuts of venison and serves it with coal-roasted sweet potatoes. Then, he cooks a hearty pot of classic Louisiana gumbo using wild duck and grills crispy-skinned duck breast for the topping.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern prepares the ultimate shore lunch of fried walleye filets, served with a tangy homemade tartar sauce, coleslaw, and crispy fried potatoes. Next, chef grills bone-in elk chops with a simple mustard glaze over hardwood charcoal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Southern Shrimp Skewers and Asian Crispy Rice
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern grills beloved shrimp in two distinct ways. He starts with jumbo shrimp and country ham skewers glazed with sweet-hot pepper jelly. Then, he creates Asian-inspired shrimp, served over crispy battle rice and a complex sambal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Venison Paillard and Hearty Hunters Stew
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern showcases venison two ways: a delicate grilled paillard with artichokes and parmesan, and a rich, slow-braised Polish hunters stew with kielbasa, mushrooms, and sauerkraut. Served with grilled leeks and coal-roasted potatoes.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Elk Tenderloin Tostadas and Grilled Rack of Ribs
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern highlights lean elk, first crafting classic Mexican tostadas with grilled tenderloin, avocado, and homemade salsa macha. Then, he grills a whole rack of elk, serving it with creamy colcannon, tarragon emulsion, and rosemary charcoal.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Grilled Clams Casino and Garlicky Clam Pizza
programme.desc: Andrew Zimmern celebrates cherrystone clams with two show-stopping recipes. He prepares classic grilled clams casino with pancetta, then pushes boundaries with an innovative grilled pizza topped with clams, garlic, chiles, and cheese.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Wild Boar Feast: Chorizo with Mussels and Whole Roasted Leg
programme.desc: Wild boar takes center stage! Andrew makes chorizo with mussels, preserved lemon and white wine. Then, he slow-roasts a whole leg over fire, served Southern-style with pickled cherries, glazed onions and mustard sauce.

programme.title: Andrew Zimmerns Wild Game Kitchen
programme.desc: Chef Andrew Zimmern shares his favorite way to prepare wild turkey breast, pan-fried over an open fire. Served with cheese sauce and jalapeno-bacon wild rice. Then, cooks a simple meal of seared salmon and a side of crispy potatoes and onions.

programme.title: Let Frankie Cook
programme.desc: Frankie fuels up for action making hot Oatmeal, and Energy Date Balls, before he cooks up the perfect post-ride feast of cheesy Juicy Lucy Burgers, Ramp-loaded pasta salad, and a maple ginger switchel to cool it all down.

programme.title: Let Frankie Cook
programme.desc: Frankie fires up a steakhouse-style spread with Italian flair from golden beets and buttery mushrooms to a sizzling Bistecca alla Fiorentina steak with salmoriglio sauce, and a smooth cold brew affogato granita.

programme.title: Let Frankie Cook
programme.sub-title: Pancake Stacks and Snacks for Two
programme.desc: Frankie flips the script for his wife Heather making breakfast for dinner featuring Banana Maple Pancakes, Eggs Benedict with prosciutto cotto, Home Fries with Bloody Mary Ketchup, Sausage Scrapple, and a boozy Espresso Milkshake.

programme.title: Let Frankie Cook
programme.desc: Frankie explores his Italian roots, pairing each pasta shape with its perfect sauce-from Cavatelli with Super Green Sauce to Pappardelle in pork ragout, ricotta Gnocchi with punchy anchovy pecorino, and cozy Squash Orzotto with bloomed poppy seeds.

programme.desc: Frankie makes pizza magic with two incredible doughs, turning his kitchen into a pizza party with grilled sausage pizza, cheesy Grandma Pies, golden Panzerotti, and a sweet dessert pizza topped with ricotta, berries, and honey.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.

programme.title: Killer Couples
programme.desc: "Killer Couples" is in the same vein of the long-running true-crime series "Snapped," which tells stories of people who commit murder or attempt murder, but with a focus on couples who commit crimes. Using re-creations and firsthand accounts, each episode digs into a case, telling the story of the couples romance, how the relationship evolved from love to manipulation, and what ultimately led the couple to commit the crime. The stories range from teenage lovers who go on a multistate crime spree to lesbian lovers who want to eliminate one of their husbands.

programme.title: Rick Steins Road to Mexico
programme.desc: Rick Stein heads east from Oaxaca to the Yucatan Peninsula, a place once frequented by real pirates of the Caribbean, including Sir Francis Drake. Here, where the Europeans first landed over five hundred years ago, the local folk have lighter skins and blue or green eyes. They feast on the hottest chilli of them all, the habanero, and give slow food a new meaning as they bury and cook their Pibil dishes below ground on hot rocks.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Variations on a Theme of Fathers Day
programme.desc: In order that Hobbo can find out more about Nelly, his supposed mother, he has Howard eavesdrop on her when she is visiting Pearl. Soon realising what Howard is up to, the women plant a completely false story about Hobbos father being a hippy. Hobbo loses no time in making himself look exactly like the description of his father, complete with earrings and beads.

programme.desc: A millionaire posthumously hires Miss Marple to investigate a crime, but she is given no details. Shes instructed to go on a coach tour of historic homes and ends up in Abbey Dulcis where she is invited to stay at the Old Manor.

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Behind Every Bush There Is Not Necessarily a Howard

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: In the port of Wexford Michael takes to the seas in a one hundred year old lifeboat and discovers a hero of the American navy. He tunes in to the Meeting of the `Waters at the Vale of Avoca then heads for Wicklow.

programme.title: Great British Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo embarks on a railway adventure from the coalfields of South Wales around the Bristol Channel to the southernmost tip of Cornwall. His first stop is Whitland in Carmarthenshire, where in the early 20th century, thrill-seekers gathered on Pendine Sands to indulge their need for speed. Michael joins latter day petrol heads to burn rubber on the beach in an iconic 3 wheeler.

programme.title: Teleshopping

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: On Sri Lanka, the Chinese are building a huge new port and their money has helped the Sri Lankan government bring a 30-year war to a brutal end. Simon Reeve also visits the north of the island - the scene of vicious battles between fighters from the Tamil minority and the Sri Lankan army. Heading north to Bangladesh, Simon investigates one of the Indian Oceans fastest growing industries - providing prawns.

programme.title: Indian Ocean with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The last leg of Simon Reeves journey begins on the northern tip of Sumatra, near the epicentre of the 2004 tsunami, and takes him to the south western corner of Australia. In Banda Aceh, Sharia law is in force and Simon joins the local vice and virtue squad who patrol the streets and beaches. In the Indonesian capital of Jakarta, Simon investigates the shocking trade in exotic pets.

programme.title: Operation Arctic with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon travels to an unspoilt corner of Greenland that could become one of the biggest uranium mines in the world, while Kate follows the oil money thats shaped Alaska. In Churchill, Gordon learns how to stay safe when living side by side with the worlds largest living land carnivore.

programme.title: Operation Arctic with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Gordon meets the Polar Bear Cops tasked with keeping the town safe. Kate heads to Sweden to help round up some reindeer and Simon joins the intrepid NASA scientists monitoring the melt of Greenlands glaciers. Plus, all the live action from the bears out on the tundra.

programme.title: Louis Theroux: Miami Mega Jail
programme.desc: Louis spends time in the fifth and sixth floors of Miami County Jail, where many of the most volatile inmates are incarcerated; one of the most notorious sections of the prison. The inmates have developed a strange and violent jail culture and live under the sway of a gladiatorial code. Housed in large cage-like dwellings that hold up to 24 men, they remain in the cells almost all the time.

programme.title: Louis Theroux: Miami Mega Jail
programme.desc: Louis Theroux goes deeper into the jail system, meeting an alleged triple murderer facing a possible death sentence. He also follows a group of forty or so younger inmates who have escaped prison by pleading guilty and agreeing to attend a four month military style boot camp.

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: A couple prepare to face the reality of their surprise pregnancy, parents who know that their baby has serious medical complications prepare for labour, and a first-time mum races to the maternity ward before her baby arrives.

programme.title: One Born Every Minute
programme.desc: On her birthday, midwife and single mother-of-two Lara contemplates life and love while delivering twins. Meanwhile, a nervous father whos clueless about the labour process prays for a quick delivery.

programme.title: Interior Design Masters
programme.desc: After a tough first week transforming upmarket apartments in Manchester, the remaining nine designers return to Michelles design studio on the south coast to find out about their next challenge. Welcomed by host Alan Carr, they are happy to discover that this week they are going to be able to work on their own for the first time. Michelle tells them that shes sending them to the Surrey Hills, to the fabulous Wotton House.

programme.title: Interior Design Masters
programme.desc: Eight designers remain to battle it out to win the life-changing design contract at one of the UKs top hotels. Working in teams of two, the designers must spruce up the common rooms and an adjoining office. The two weakest designers will be sent home, upping the stakes in this third challenge.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Michael Portillo heads to Chinatown to hear of the huge contribution Chinese immigrants made to the economy, working as miners and building the transcontinental railroad. He discovers an entrepreneurial community who overcame discrimination laid down by the law, and finds that fortune favours the brave with iconic Chinese treats created in America.

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys
programme.desc: Following his Appletons guide, Michael Portillo makes a trip to the jewel in the crown of Americas National Parks, Yosemite, to behold its towering granite cliffs, its giant sequoia trees and cascading waterfalls. He discovers how early conservationists fought to protect it in law and encounters a `buffalo soldier in the heart of the forest. In Berkeley, Michael uncovers a catastrophic event, which hit the city of San Francisco hard in 1906.

programme.title: Secret Nazi Bases
programme.desc: A secret weapons programme in the heart of Austria that could have ended badly for the Allies - and may have indicated nuclear plans being concocted by Hitler.

programme.title: Nazi Hunters
programme.desc: The global search for the most sought-after World War II criminals. How Hitlers deputy Hermann Goering was captured by the Allies, leading to his suicide.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce looks at the most talked about finds of 2016 and reveals surprising updates. Art scholars searched for years for a missing work by eminent Victorian artist Alma-Tadema, but after it appeared at the Roadshow we follow the newly-restored painting as it ends up in an international exhibition.

programme.title: Antiques Roadshow
programme.desc: Fiona Bruce and the team make a return visit to Tewkesbury Abbey in Gloucestershire to uncover more treasures. Amongst the objects featured are an extremely heavy Tudor table, and an extensive collection of Maundy Money.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash

programme.title: Russia with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: The second leg of Simon Reeves journey across Russia begins in Siberia and takes him to Russias far south west and the majestic Caucasus Mountains. From Lake Baikal, the oldest and deepest lake on earth, he takes the Trans-Siberian railway to the city of Krasnoyarsk - the scene of brutal violence in the 1990s - where a cafe now pays homage to Russias president Vladimir Putin.

programme.desc: Bangers and Cash spin-off series that follows the journey of a vehicle purchased at a Mathewsons classic car auction, before being repaired, restored and re-auctioned.

programme.desc: Will and Gus look to make some quick cash as they fix and wrap a Toyota MR2 MK2. But is there money to be made in this low-spec car?

programme.title: Great American Railroad Journeys

In Berkeley, Michael uncovers a catastrophic event, which hit the city of San Francisco hard in 1906.
